project.name: Graveyard
project.description: The Graveyard project maintains an overlay with packages removed from the official portage tree.

longdescription.p: The Graveyard project maintains an overlay with packages removed from the official portage tree.

goals.p: The Graveyard project aims to provide users who want packages that have been last-rited with an overlay where they can help maintain and use these packages.

body.p: For more information, please consult our project space on the wiki.
